Terms and Conditions of "La Casa Nostra"


Welcome to "La Casa Nostra," an Android mobile application that allows you to access the menu of our restaurant, make reservations, receive promotions, and more. By using our application, you agree to the following terms and conditions:


Ownership of the application: 

 "La Casa Nostra" is owned by Cristobal Bernal and provided as a tool to facilitate interaction with our restaurant. We reserve the right to update or change the application at any time.


Use of the application: 

 The use of "La Casa Nostra" is free, but by using the application, you agree not to use it for any illegal or fraudulent purposes. You also agree not to attempt to access protected areas of the application or confidential information without our authorization.


Account registration: 

 To access certain features of "La Casa Nostra," you may need to register to create a user account. By doing so, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your login credentials and notifying us immediately if you suspect someone has used your account without authorization. 


Privacy: 

 We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more information on how we collect, use, and protect your data. 


Promotions: 

 From time to time, we may offer exclusive promotions through "La Casa Nostra." Promotions will be subject to additional terms and conditions that will be provided at the time of the offer.


Liability: 

 "La Casa Nostra" is provided "as is," without warranty of any kind. We are not liable for any direct or indirect loss or damage that may result from the use of the application. 


Changes to terms and conditions: 

 We reserve the right to update or change these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page. Your continued use of "La Casa Nostra" after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms and conditions. 


By using "La Casa Nostra," you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for using our application.
